usergroup.name: Ceph Frankfurt
usergroup.description: This is a group for anyone interested in [Ceph](http://ceph.com/). All skills levels are welcome. There is a growing user community around this Free Software distributed storage. Participants are expected to share their use cases, tips and tricks, projects, have a good time in a friendly and informal atmosphere.

meeting.name: Drink and talk before the Ceph day
meeting.description: Inktank organizes the [Ceph day February 27th](http://www.eventbrite.com/e/ceph-day-frankfurt-tickets-10173269523). Let's take this opportunity to meet and discuss Ceph the evening before.
